verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> Yah! <WH3050> Praise, <WH1984> you servants <WH5650> of Yahweh, <WH3050> praise <WH1984> the name <WH8034> of Yahweh. <WH3068>
Blessed <WH1288> be the name <WH8034> of Yahweh, <WH3068> from this time forth <WH6258> and <WH5704> forevermore. <WH5769>
From the rising <WH4217> of the sun <WH8121> to the going down <WH3996> of the same, <WH3068> Yahweh's name <WH8034> is to be praised. <WH1984>
Yahweh <WH3068> is high <WH7311> above <WH7311> all nations, <WH1471> his glory <WH3519> above <WH7311> the heavens. <WH8064>
Who is like Yahweh, <WH3068> our God, <WH430> who has his seat <WH3427> on high, <WH1361>
Who stoops down <WH8213> to see <WH7200> in heaven <WH8064> and in the earth? <WH776>
He raises up <WH6965> the poor <WH1800> out of the dust. <WH6083> Lifts <WH7311> up the needy <WH34> from the ash heap; <WH830>
that he may set <WH3427> him with princes, <WH5081> even with the princes <WH5081> of his people. <WH5971>
He settles <WH3427> the barren woman <WH6135> in her home, <WH1004> as a joyful <WH8056> mother <WH517> of children. <WH1121> Praise <WH1984> Yah! <WH3050>
